settings.title: Where do you ship to?
settings.text: We ship to Canada, the USA and select International countries - Austrialia, New Zealand, England, France, Germany, Switzerland, Japan. We are working on expanding our shipping network and appreciate your patience.

settings.title: How much is shipping and how long does it take?
settings.text:
Flat rate shipping to Canada: C$9.50, usually 2 to 8 business days

Flat rate shipping to USA: US$8, usually 2 to 8 business days

International shipping: C$12.50, usually 10-20 business days 

Shipping is FREE on orders over $60. This refers to Expedited Shipping for Canada Post and First Class USPS for USA. Shipping is 2-8 business days.

Why can’t we ship “regular” mail, you might wonder?

Because of the nature of our products and packaging (which aren’t always flat) we don't have the options of regular or media mail. (Not to mention: regular mail is also untracked and takes 2 times longer to reach you! And who wants to wait longer for their goodies to arrive?)

“Why do I have to pay for shipping? I’m used to getting free shipping!”

While we offer C$9.50 / USD $8 shipping on orders under $60, it REALLY costs us closer to C$12 on average to ship within North America. We know it sounds crazy — but we pay the difference out of pocket so that we can offer the best flat rate to you!

It’s tough being a small retailer (we are just 3 women!) up against the “free shipping movement” of our bigger competitors. But we’re doing our best, and we’re grateful for your understanding. 💙

settings.title: How to make a return
settings.text:
We want you to be 100% happy with your purchase! If for any reason you’re not thrilled, please get in touch with us here or send an email to hello@qforquinn.com. We’ll do our best to make it right.

To make sure you get the right product, we recommend that you refer to our size chart before purchasing.

Please note:
For hygiene reasons, we can’t accept returns or exchanges of masks or underwear. (This means that you’re always guaranteed a brand-new pair when you buy from us — phew!)

Socks and other items should be in their original packaging for returns or exchanges.

If you’d like to return or exchange items, please get in touch with us here or send an email to hello@qforquinn.com. Any return shipping charges and a 10% restocking fee will apply.

[START A RETURN]

Or ask a question, or just say hi :)

settings.title: What if I'm not happy with my order?
settings.text: We want you to be 100% happy with your purchase! If for any reason you are not happy or have a problem with your order, we'll solve it to your satisfaction. Simply get in touch with us at hello@qforquinn.com.

settings.title: Product
settings.text: Below are some frequently asked questions about our products.

settings.title: How do I pick the right size?
settings.text:
We have created asizing guide for each of our products to help you pick the right size. If you still have questions please do not hesitate to contact us. We'd love to help!

[I need help]

settings.title: Are all your socks seamless?
settings.text: Yes. Every pair we make has a seamlessor invisible toe seam to maximize comfort. We take pride in knowing we have thousands of customers who are highly sensitive to their toe seam wearing our socks comfortably. Learn more about our seamless socks here.

settings.title: How should I care for my items?
settings.text:
Because of the delicate nature of organic cotton and merino wool we recommend washing cold and lay flat.

Short on time? We know what that’s like. Wash cold, and tumble dry on low heat.

settings.title: Why should you buy certified organic socks for your baby, toddler or kid?
settings.text: Buying organic cotton socks or clothing goes beyond caring for our environment. The amount of toxins in children’s clothing is astonishing. Take socks for example, a recent study found 9/10 socks had traces of BPA and Parabens – chemicals that are hormone disruptors and have been linked to variously illnesses. By buying certified organic you are purchasing socks that have been tested free of any harmful toxins or chemicals at every stage of the production process.

settings.title: What does GOTS certified organic cotton and how is it different from regular organic cotton?
settings.text: The Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) is the worldwide leading textile processing standard for organic fibres, backed up by independent certification of the entire textile supply chain. It is essentially the “gold” standard of organic cotton. You can read more about the certification here

settings.title: Are our products suitable for babies / kids with eczema?
settings.text:
While we cannot claim or guarantee that our products are 100% suitable for babies and kids with eczema we have a number of customers whose babies and kids suffer from eczema and have had no issues or flare ups with our socks. In fact, our founder, Melita’s son suffered from severe eczema and reactions to certain socks in the market. This encouraged Melita to create socks that were 100% breathable and with the maximum organic cotton content to avoid moisture being trapped in – the leading cause of foot eczema in babies, kids and adults.

We have had an high success rate amongst our customers with eczema and sensitive skin.

Our reviews show for it:
"My 18 month old had very bad eczema on his feet and nothing helped. Within a week or switching to these socks, the eczema has improved so much! His feet are clear and eczema free!!" - Sheryl

"My son was a skinny baby with eczema that no socks would stay on, which led me to Q for Quinn to start with. Now he’s 3 and we’ve had many pairs of Q socks because he loves the patterns, they stay on, and they don’t irritate his skin. He names them all (city socks, watermelon socks, etc) and loves matching with his dad’s socks. These ones have grips so we told him they’re so he won’t slip and can run fast- now his “super fast socks” are the running favorite!" - Kyla

Read all our reviews here

settings.title: Do you offer wholesale or bulk discounts?
settings.text:
Yes we do! If you are a retailer, please visit our wholesale page here.

If you'd like to simply stock up or buy for gifts, simply use code BUNDLE for 20% off at checkout. Applies to orders over $200.

If you have specific questions, please feel free to reach out to us at hello@qforquinn.com.
